text:
Hey to all,
I have an opening for a Lead iOS Engineer -AI Productivity app development.
Minimum +10 years iOS experience.
Swift and Java knowledge. Great problem solving and communication skills
If interesting please apply directly through the link or distribute among your network.
Looking for someone with previous experience shipping Productivity apps. Ex-HubSpot developers are welcomed.
Salary USD$100,000 - USD$120,000
Remote Worldwide - Hong Kong timezone, UK timezone
<https://app.loxo.co/job/MjM4NDctOHQ1cmZ4MXBibHkzOGw3MA==?t=1722525497705>
